tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ai_model_id INT NOT NULL,
    operation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Network_Operations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_id INT NOT NULL,
    operation_description VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    operation_status BOOLEAN,
    ai_system_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (ai_system_id) REFERENCES AI_Systems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE network_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(255),
    operation_type VARCHAR(50),
    started_at TIMESTAMP,
    completed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ai_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    model_type VARCHAR(50),
    trained_on TIMESTAMP,
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE service_quality (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    operation_id INT,
    model_id INT,
    quality_score DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
   device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   device_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   device_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
   traffic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   device_id INTEGER REFERENCES network_devices(device_id),
   user_id INTEGER REFERENCES network_users(user_id),
   traffic_data JSONB NOT NULL,
   traffic_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ai_predictions (
   prediction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   model_id INTEGER REFERENCES ai_models(model_id),
   traffic_id INTEGER REFERENCES network_traffic(traffic_id),
   prediction_data JSONB NOT NULL,
   prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
